title: IDEAL Electrical 35-028 Diagonal-Cutting Plier - 8 in., Pliers with Knife-to-Knife Blades, Dipped Grip Handles
features: Made in USA: For more than 100 years, IDEAL Electrical has proudly made high quality tools in the USA by marrying innovation with tradition. We are committed to building our communities and creating American jobs
Improved Grip: This tool includes textured PVC grips which provide superior comfort, functionality, and improved grip for commercial use
Long-Lasting Performance: This cutting tool is made from drop-forged, high-carbon steel and features knife-to-knife blades for excellent cutting performance and added durability
Added Power: The pliers feature a high-leverage design adding cutting power while making the tool easy to use
Product Specifications: 8 in. long IDEAL Electrical Diagonal-Cutting Pliers is equipped with dipped-grip PVC handles, knife-to-knife blades, and high leverage pivots points
description: IDEAL Electrical Diagonal Cutting Plier is Made in the USA from drop-forged, high-carbon steel for extra strength and durability. This cutting tool is designed to serve everyday electrical cutting requirements. Featuring high leverage pivoting and knife-to-knife blades this tool provides easy and long-lasting cutting performance. Textured PVC dipped grips bond to the steel handles during immersion process, ensuring uniform shape, optimum adhesion, and perfect form. The heavy-duty handles provide superior comfort and better control.
